about_the_game:
In this tower defense you enter the world of Magonia and defend it against hordes of humans, orcs, ogres and other evil forces. Fight in green graslands, dusty deserts, rocky hills, lush forests and icy tundras, adapting your strategy to the terrain and the enemy forces. Call down meteors from the sky or call reinforcements to assist you in the battle. Expand your arsenal of towers and equip them with items you loot from mighty bosses. Level up your house and learn skills to improve your towers or spells.

Important Features

  • Around 20 unique maps

  • Hundreds of enemies and bosses

  • 8 unique base towers with three base tiers and two special tiers each

  • Each special tower has four different upgrades

  • An extensive skilltree with around 100 different skills and spellcards

  • 5 completely unique spells with upgrades

  • Items which can be equipped by towers

  • Challenging endgame

  • Dynamic difficulty system in form of wave modifiers (additional enemies, strengths etc.)

No chickens were harmed during the development of this game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is about killing enemies with your towers, before they reach the end of the path. This is the only form of violence involved in this game, the deaths are accompanied by animations and small blood splatters on the ground.
